name: Computer Science
description: Focuses on algorithms, software, and systems. Prepares students for tech-driven roles.
careerPath: Software Developer, Data Scientist, AI Engineer, Researcher.

name: Information Science
description: Bridges technology and information management. Involves organizing, analyzing, and using data.
careerPath: Database Administrator, IT Consultant, Information Manager.

name: Software Engineering
description: Applies engineering principles to software development and maintenance.
careerPath: Software Engineer, DevOps Engineer, Systems Architect.

name: Dentistry
description: Medical field dealing with oral health, teeth, and related treatments.

name: Radiology
description: Specializes in imaging to diagnose and treat diseases using X-rays, MRIs, and CT scans.

name: Anesthesia
description: Focuses on pain management and patient safety during surgeries and medical procedures.
careerPath: Anesthesiologist, Pain Specialist, Critical Care Expert.

name: Medicine
description: Broad field covering prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of diseases.

name: Biomedical Engineering
description: Combines biology and engineering to develop healthcare solutions.
careerPath: Biomedical Engineer, Clinical Engineer, Research Scientist.

name: Chemical Engineering
description: Applies chemistry, physics, and biology to solve industrial and environmental problems.
careerPath: Chemical Engineer, Process Engineer, Energy Specialist.

name: Food Engineering
description: Focuses on food processing, safety, and technology.
careerPath: Food Engineer, Quality Control Specialist, Nutrition Scientist.

name: Water Engineering
description: Deals with water resources, supply, treatment, and environmental impact.
